# This table represents the surface brightness data of the galactic centre 
# excess (GCE) from Figure 10 in Di Mauro (2021) 
# Di Mauro M., 2021, Phys. Rev. D, 103, 063029 (arXiv:2101.04694)
# https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevD.103.063029
#
# I include this data in the repository (courtesy Di Mauro) so that it is 
# possible to recreate the Figure where I compare with the GCE. 
# However, if you intent to use this data for your own purposes, please cite 
# Di Mauro (2021)
#
# Angle  / best-fit SB / error SB / ul SB  [MeV/cm^2/s/sr]
0.5 0.17095811316887327 0.0031025344620928164 1e-20
1.5 0.02941558471167156 0.0009896929910689117 1e-20
2.5 0.014050850407529904 0.0005974904101282616 1e-20
3.5 0.006805447890605538 0.00043915752410843463 1e-20
4.5 0.005719503669053203 0.00034554123974995274 1e-20
5.5 0.003804755985232999 0.0002704906543140139 1e-20
6.5 0.00224746906782072 0.00021741645211642018 1e-20
7.5 0.0018793293122206331 0.0001981330085300266 1e-20
8.5 0.0013560443002482367 0.00016743877301518266 1e-20
9.5 0.0015243712449247919 0.0001463595298226087 1e-20
10.5 0.0010052988126277593 0.0001322550901829352 1e-20
11.5 0.0009518424012601884 0.00011636170441162516 1e-20
12.5 0.0005949030868410471 0.00010650956115681071 1e-20
13.5 1e-20 1e-20 0.0004929721419232277
14.5 0.00027432093067439306 0.00010026626688085556 1e-20
15.5 1e-20 1e-20 0.00047021737191670093
16.5 1e-20 1e-20 0.0003981329820776529
17.5 1e-20 1e-20 0.00037239585553402267
18.5 0.00023287221274202754 7.408917246068704e-05 1e-20
